summary: ', 'Profile:', 'Experience business merchant, with focus on long term customer relations, building profitable business. Skilled people management and “playing” coach, both for onsite, and remote management. A positive and creatively thinking profile. Strong team player and fun colleague. ', '', 'Values:', 'Honesty, Partnership, Passion, Boldness, Integrity & Visionary', '', 'Product placement success:', 'With Creative:', 'Vado HD, The UK Program "Dancing on ICE", Vado used as the blog camera, and Creative has special section on the DVD release.', '', 'With Microsoft:', 'National TV station TV2´s Christmas calendar in 2008 called “Mikkel og Guldkortet”, was the last product placement I did in Microsoft. The deal was made in the spring of 2007, promoting Xbox, Samsung and Fujitsu Siemens products.', 'Part of the popular TV sitcom “KLOVN”, season 4, episode 5, Aben Ditmark.', '
